flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary:
If you can’t explore the Moon or Mars … you can always explore your neighborhood!

The main goal of this project is to alter a remote controlled vehicle
and control it via Internet Telerobotics using the Mobile Telephone Network
(WWAN - Wireless W
guide.title: Mobile Earth Rover - 3.5G Exploration
